interactivity.to_get_this_event: Have 15+ Ami Lust before The Price of Experience begins the event chain. Autoplays after " Before the Sun Comes Up " . This event is the final event in an event chain started from " The Price of Experience " .
interactivity.to_miss_this_event: Have less than 15 Ami Lust before The Price of Experience . Replaced by Does She Remind You? .

progression.synopsis: Sensei is woken up by Ami , who's been waiting by his bedside for his attention.

changelog: This Event was added in Update .18p2.
